lead_paragraph: Arnold Palmer’s grandson Sam Saunders has received a sponsor’s exemption to play in the Bob Hope Classic, Jan. 18-24 in La Quinta, Calif., a tournament Palmer won five times.
snippet: Arnold Palmer’s grandson Sam Saunders has received a sponsor’s exemption to play in the Bob Hope Classic, Jan. 18-24 in La Quinta, Calif., a tournament Palmer won five times.
